# fareLineItems

**Instance Property**

An array of price-related items that break down the costs of the ride.

## Declaration

```swift
var fareLineItems: [INRideFareLineItem]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

When the cost of a ride has multiple components, use [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRideFareLineItem] objects to break down the individual costs of the ride. You can use line items to specify fixed charges, per-mile charges, special surcharges, or any other charges that you designate. The system displays the fare line items to the user as part of the pricing information.

## Specifying Pricing Information

- **priceRange**: The range of prices for this ride option.
- **specialPricing**: A user-visible string describing any special pricing considerations that apply to this ride.
- **specialPricingBadgeImage**: A template image for Maps to display when special prices apply.
- **usesMeteredFare**: A Boolean value indicating whether the price uses a metered fare instead of a fixed price.
